text: The 2011 Formula D season (officially titled Formula Drift Pro Championship) was the eighth season of the Formula D series. The season began on April 9 in Long Beach and ended on October 8 at Toyota Speedway at Irwindale. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" |- ! Round ! Event ! Location ! Date ! Winner !
